attributes.action: Introduce proportional representation in Westminster elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Prime Minister,
Your government is currently in power despite receiving only around 30% of votes cast in the last election. To avoid this situation in the future you should convene a public committee made up of representatives from all parties as well as members of the public to devise a fair method of proportional representation for future General Elections.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
